item.description:
Join us Monday, Mar 25th, for Geeks Who Drink pub quiz at Battery Park! The quiz starts at 7:00pm - join us and Geeks Who Drink http://geekswhodrink.com/518/ . The quiz consists of 8 rounds of 8 questions and includes a picture round, music round, and chances for FREE BEER! Last week "Beat The Heat" took first prize! Come early to get a good seat and a good team. ;)

Battery Park is conveniently located in the Financial District near State Street (Orange and Blue Line), Downtown Crossing (Orange and Red Lines), and a short walk to Park Street (Red and Green Lines). Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB. You can view Battery Park's menu here: http://www.batteryparkboston.com/.

Hope to see you there!Â  - Isabel
item.how_to_find_us: Look at others' meetup pics and try to find. Ask bartender or hostess if you cannot find us.
item.name: Pub Quiz with Geeks Who Drink at Battery Park Mar 25th
